description: Former college roommates, Pheonix Fellington and Wesley Woods have always had a close friendship, and there may have been a moment or two where they were VERY close. So, when the two reconnect for a night out after three years, things are guaranteed to be fun. After time at the bars the two horny guys relax in the den and start to share all their old stories, including the ones that led to some wild cum filled deep-dicking! Perhaps it's time to make some new memories...just don't get caught by the wife!
title: Don't Tell My Wife, Scene #01
